## generateMoves() function

Return all moves for a given board state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function generateMoves(state: Readonly<BoardState>, options?: {
    legal?: boolean;
    piece?: PieceSymbol;
    from?: Square | number;
    to?: Square | number;
}): HexMove[];
```
